profile.name: Siddesh Sandesh Ubale
profile.title: Full Stack Developer & Team Lead
profile.summary: Highly-skilled Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in React, React Native, and Node.js. Expert in managing client relationships and delivering scalable enterprise applications.

experience.details: Leading hybrid mobile app and web development. Specializing in JS package development and Docker implementation.
Full stack web development and hybrid mobile app delivery.
Contributed IT skills and technical expertise for social welfare initiatives. Supported the organization's digital presence and technical needs.

projects.title: Dgraph UI
projects.desc: UI contribution for a distributed, open-source graph database designed for high scalability. Handled complex relationship visualizations.
responsibilities: Wrote code for new features in the Dgraph product.
Authored unit and integration tests for developed functionality.
Contributed to UI improvements supporting the cloud version of Dgraph.
Developed in-house JavaScript libraries for internal use.
Contributed to the Typhoon UI library.

projects.title: GiggleMusic
projects.desc: A comprehensive social media platform for musicians to network, find jobs, trade instruments, and sell concert tickets.
responsibilities: Managed the full project lifecycle from requirements to deployment on UAT and Production.
Developed features for job posting, instrument marketplace, and ticketing systems.
Led cross-functional teams and maintained daily client communication (MOM).
Enforced coding standards, performed code reviews, and executed test plans.

projects.title: SEB Cares (Sarawak Energy)
projects.desc: Vendor services for utility service apps (Android/iOS) and admin portal website.
responsibilities: Acted as liaison between Operations and IT for business requirement gathering.
Resolved server-side errors and existing bugs in the Admin Portal.
Managed deployment on UAT and Production environments.
Facilitated daily client synchronization and documentation handover.

projects.title: SPRINT (Hurix Digital)
projects.desc: Educational interactive slides for senior students focusing on critical concept understanding through complex animations.
responsibilities: Developed educational interactive modules with complex animations.
Managed delivery timelines and implemented story change requests.
Resolved defects and provided technical support.
Established coding standards and distributed work based on client meetings.
